task.title: Navigator
task.shortdesc: The Navigator Physical view shows the physical hierarchy of the network, with enterprise at the top, followed by the operating platform, and so on. Have a look at the levels of the Navigator.

step.cmd: Click to open the operating platform level (Linux Systems, UNIX Systems, Windows Systems, or z/OS Systems).
step.stepresult: Opening a level in the Navigator reveals the next level in that branch.

step.cmd: Open the operating platform level to see the names for the systems running on that platform.

Open any system to see the monitoring agents installed on that system for monitoring applications and resources, and, below agents, the elements, or attributes, for which the agent can collect data for reporting and testing.

taskbody.tasktroubleshooting: Expand and Collapse enables you to open and close levels in the Navigator without selecting an item.You can close the tree entirely by double-clicking the Enterprise item. To expand the tree, double-click again.
